body_html: this seems to be user-error in the OpenNMT example. .backward is being given gradients of type autograd.Variable, but the gradients need to be of type torch.*Tensor. We haven't added grad of grad support yet.
body_text: this seems to be user-error in the OpenNMT example. .backward is being given gradients of type autograd.Variable, but the gradients need to be of type torch.*Tensor. We haven't added grad of grad support yet.
body: this seems to be user-error in the OpenNMT example. `.backward` is being given gradients of type `autograd.Variable`, but the gradients need to be of type `torch.*Tensor`. We haven't added grad of grad support yet.
